law.text: If any provision of this chapter or its application to any person or circumstances is held invalid by a court of competent jurisdiction, the invalidity does not affect other provisions or applications of this chapter that can be given effect without the invalid provision or application, and to this end the provisions of this chapter are severable.
law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 84, effective January 1, 1989.
